Articles.Content: Skye Storme is a YouTuber who is known for producing gameplay series and tutorials for all sorts of simulation games, and he decided to tackle Kerbal Space Program in a career mode series on his channel. Follow Skye as he starts with the very basics of the game and works his way over all the hurdles the game throws at him.

Thanks for the link! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

What dialect does he speak? I'm hearing "Kerbal Spice Program" all the time. ^^

This reminds me: I want Arrakis in the game!
